word: On one occasion my physician said, "Unless there is some change, you have only three days to live." In the night season One stood by my bedside and said to me, "Christ is the Restorer; Satan is the Destroyer. I am your Redeemer, and I will heal you." From that moment I began to recover, and when the physician came, he said, "Mrs. White, you are better. There is a sparkle in your eye which must be there in order for you to have health."
